thread.title: DeMarcus Cousins is hosting a massive scavenger hunt in Kentucky
thread.title_full: DeMarcus Cousins is hosting a massive scavenger hunt in Kentucky

title: DeMarcus Cousins is hosting a massive scavenger hunt in Kentucky
text:
DeMarcus Cousins is hosting a massive scavenger hunt in Kentucky FOX Sports 
Oct 13, 2015 at 4:01p ET + 
If you're game, DeMarcus Cousins has prizes waiting for you. David Richard / USA TODAY Sports FOX Sports   4:01p ET 
Basketball rules in Kentucky. Sure, there's no NBA team in the state. But the two elite college programs have staked their claim as the biggest show in town. 
Except for occasions like this week, that is, when former Kentucky standout DeMarcus Cousins and his Sacramento Kings will take on Anthony Davis and the New Orleans Pelicans in Lexington. And to get you ready for the festivities, Cousins is hosting a massive scavenger hunt using billboards and a phone number to give fans prizes, memorabilia, and tickets to Friday's game. true â€” DeMarcus Cousins (@boogiecousins) October 10, 2015 
Leave it to Cousins to take fan interaction to a whole new level. MORE NEWS: Want stories delivered to you? Sign up for our NBA newsletters.
